block.p: Susan Mary Strauss and Keith Michael Andruschak were married yesterday by the Rev. Joe A. Francis at St. Monica's Roman Catholic Church in New York.

The bride, 35, will continue to use her name professionally. She is the president of Estate Orchids, a wholesale and retail business in New York that she operates with her mother, Margaret Strauss of Millbrook, N.Y., and her sister, Emily M. Strauss of New York. The bride graduated from Bentley College. Her father, Stanley Strauss, now retired, was a residential real estate developer and an investor in Millbrook.
Susan Mary Strauss and Keith Michael Andruschak were married yesterday by the Rev. Joe A. Francis at St. Monica's Roman Catholic Church in New York.

The bride, 35, will continue to use her name professionally. She is the president of Estate Orchids, a wholesale and retail business in New York that she operates with her mother, Margaret Strauss of Millbrook, N.Y., and her sister, Emily M. Strauss of New York. The bride graduated from Bentley College. Her father, Stanley Strauss, now retired, was a residential real estate developer and an investor in Millbrook.

Mr. Andruschak, 34, is an associate in New York at Clifford Chance Rogers & Wells, a law firm. He graduated from the University of Rochester and magna cum laude from the Syracuse University College of Law. His parents, Dr. Gloria Andruschak and Dr. Myron P. Andruschak, live in Rochester, where his mother, who is retired, was the college physician at Nazareth College and his father is a dentist.
